column1: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a science and a set of computational technologies that are inspired by, but typically operate quite differently from the ways people use their nervous systems and bodies to sense, learn, reason, and take action.
column2: Does this statement suggest that AI is currently on a path to matching human intelligence in versatility?
